name: @flatfile/adapter
description: A lightweight adapter for working with Flatfile's Portal
author: David Boskovic <david@flatfile.io>

scripts.build: trash build && nqr build:main && nqr build:module && nqr build:browser-deps && nqr build:browser && nqr build:browser-cjs && nqr build:browser-dist && nqr build:resolve-sourcemaps
scripts.build:browser-deps: mkdirp build/temp && browserify node_modules/hash.js/lib/hash.js --standalone hash -o build/temp/hash.js
scripts.build:browser-dist: rollup -c config/exports/rollup.config.js -f iife -o build/dist/index.js && nqr build:browser-dist-minify
scripts.unit: nqr build && nqr build:tests && nyc ava
scripts.test: nqr lint && nqr unit && nqr check-coverage
scripts.watch: nqr build && nqr build:tests -- --no-browser && concurrently -r --kill-others 'npm run --silent build:main -- -w' 'npm run --silent build:tests -- -w --no-browser' 'sleepms 2000 && ava --watch'
scripts.cov: nqr unit && nqr html-coverage && opn coverage/index.html
scripts.serve:dev: nqr build:module && nqr build:browser-dist-local; node serve.js
scripts.docs:md: typedoc src --readme none --theme markdown --excludePrivate --mode file --out ../Developers/docs/sdk --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --platform docusaurus
scripts.release: nqr reset && nqr test && nqr docs:publish && nqr changelog

scripts-info.unit: Build the library and run unit tests
scripts-info.test: Lint, build, and test the library
scripts-info.watch: Watch source files, rebuild library on changes, rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.cov: Run tests, generate the HTML coverage report, and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs:publish: Generate HTML API documentation and push it to GitHub Pages
scripts-info.docs:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.changelog: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag a release
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.release: Clean, build, test, publish docs, and prepare release (a one-step publish process)
